Uses of Class
popt4jlib.MSSC1D.CException

  • Packages that use CException 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.MSSC1D
    Package implements a Parallel Dynamic-Programming (DP) - based algorithm for clustering in a Minimum-Sum-of-Square-Error-Distances a sequence of numbers.

    • Uses of CException in popt4jlib.MSSC1D

      Methods in popt4jlib.MSSC1D that throw CException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClusterSet.addCluster(Cluster c)
      add the Cluster given in the input argument as an extra cluster in this ClusterSet but first checks to ensure that the smallest value in c is the successor of the greatest number contained in the ClusterSet (remember that ClusterSet objects hold integer index values to the sequence they are clustering).
      void ClusterSet.addClustersRight(ClusterSet cs)
      add the clusters in the input ClusterSet argument to (the right of) this ClusterSet object by calling the method addCluster(c) for each of the clusters of cs.
      void Cluster.addSet(java.util.Set s)
      adds all numbers in the set to the cluster.
      private double Cluster.avg(Params p) 
      Cluster ClusterSet.getCluster(int startind, int endind)
      return the Cluster object that starts with startind and ends with endind.
      private ClusterSet Solver.makeAllClusters()
      has same purpose as makeAllClustersMatrix(p), but uses Cluster and ClusterSet objects which it returns.
      double Solver.solveDP()
      solve the 1-D clustering problem (using Cluster and ClusterSet objects).
      double Solver.solveDP2()
      this method is the same as solveDP() except the (i,k) loop runs vertically instead of horizontally so that memory is saved Thus the outer loop is k, the inner loop is i
      double Solver.solveDP2Parallel(int numthreads)
      this method is the same as solveDP2() except we use numthreads threads to run the inner vertical loop for the i=n-2...0 computing the k-th column values.
      double Solver.solveDP2ParallelMat(int numthreads)
      this method is the same as solveDP2Parallel() using numthreads threads to run the inner vertical loop for the i=n-2...0 computing the k-th column values.
      double Solver.solveDPMat()
      this method is the same as solveDP() except it doesn't use ClusterSets.
      Constructors in popt4jlib.MSSC1D that throw CException 
      Constructor and Description
      ClusterSet(java.lang.Integer i)
      public 1-argument constructor.
      ClusterSet(int i, int j)
      public 2-argument constructor.
